verses.verse: Then <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, for he hath <S%H1342>triumphed<s%> <S%H1342>gloriously<s%>: the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> hath he <S%H7411>thrown<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song<s%>, and he is become my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: <S%H2088>he<s%> is my <S%H410>God<s%>, and I will prepare him an <S%H5115>habitation<s%>; my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

<S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%> and his <S%H2428>host<s%> hath he <S%H3384>cast<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H7991>captains<s%> also are <S%H2883>drowned<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
The <S%H8415>depths<s%> have <S%H3680>covered<s%> them: they <S%H3381>sank<s%> into the <S%H4688>bottom<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%>.

Thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, is become <S%H142>glorious<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>: thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, hath dashed in <S%H7492>pieces<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.

And in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of thine <S%H1347>excellency<s%> thou hast <S%H2040>overthrown<s%> them that rose up <S%H6965>against<s%> thee: thou sentest <S%H7971>forth<s%> thy <S%H2740>wrath<s%>, which <S%H398>consumed<s%> them as <S%H7179>stubble<s%>.

And with the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of thy <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were gathered <S%H6192>together<s%>, the <S%H5140>floods<s%> stood <S%H5324>upright<s%> as an <S%H5067>heap<s%>, and the <S%H8415>depths<s%> were <S%H7087>congealed<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

The <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H7291>pursue<s%>, I will <S%H5381>overtake<s%>, I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>; my <S%H5315>lust<s%> shall be <S%H4390>satisfied<s%> upon them; I will <S%H7324>draw<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%>, my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H3423>destroy<s%> them.
Thou didst <S%H5398>blow<s%> with thy <S%H7307>wind<s%>, the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> them: they <S%H6749>sank<s%> as <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

Who is like unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, among the <S%H410>gods<s%>? who is like thee, <S%H142>glorious<s%> in <S%H6944>holiness<s%>, <S%H3372>fearful<s%> in <S%H8416>praises<s%>, <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%>?
Thou stretchedst <S%H5186>out<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them.

Thou in thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> hast led <S%H5148>forth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed<s%>: thou hast <S%H5095>guided<s%> them in thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5116>habitation<s%>.
The <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and be <S%H7264>afraid<s%>: <S%H2427>sorrow<s%> shall take <S%H270>hold<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6429>Palestina<s%>.

<S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H441>dukes<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be <S%H926>amazed<s%>; the mighty <S%H352>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H7461>trembling<s%> shall take <S%H270>hold<s%> upon them; all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall melt <S%H4127>away<s%>.

<S%H367>Fear<s%> and <S%H6343>dread<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon them; by the <S%H1419>greatness<s%> of thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> they shall be as <S%H1826>still<s%> as a <S%H68>stone<s%>; till thy <S%H5971>people<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, till the <S%H5971>people<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%>, <S%H2098>which<s%> thou hast <S%H7069>purchased<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> them in, and <S%H5193>plant<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, in the <S%H4349>place<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which thou hast <S%H6466>made<s%> for thee to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>, in the <S%H4720>Sanctuary<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, which thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H3559>established<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

For the <S%H5483>horse<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and with his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> upon them; but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%>, the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and all the <S%H802>women<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her with <S%H8596>timbrels<s%> and with <S%H4246>dances<s%>.

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, <S%H7891>Sing<s%> ye to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, for he hath <S%H1342>triumphed<s%> <S%H1342>gloriously<s%>; the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> hath he <S%H7411>thrown<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5265>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H7793>Shur<s%>; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>.

¶ And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4785>Marah<s%>, they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4785>Marah<s%>, for they were <S%H4751>bitter<s%>: therefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4785>Marah<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What shall we <S%H8354>drink<s%>?

And he <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3384>shewed<s%> him a <S%H6086>tree<s%>, which when he had <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were made <S%H4985>sweet<s%>: there he <S%H7760>made<s%> for them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>, and there he <S%H5254>proved<s%> them,

And <S%H559>said<s%>, If thou wilt <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and wilt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and wilt give <S%H238>ear<s%> to his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, I will <S%H7760>put<s%> none of these <S%H4245>diseases<s%> upon thee, which I have <S%H7760>brought<s%> upon the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>: for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H7495>healeth<s%> thee.

¶ And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H362>Elim<s%>, where were <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H5869>wells<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, and threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> palm <S%H8558>trees<s%>: and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> there by the <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
